## 🎯 Features
* Google Drive v3 API based
* With additional Firefox and Chrome extension
* OAuth 2.0 authorization
* Integrity checks (MD5 checksum)
* Transfer retries
* Robust logging
* Hassle-free setup thanks to Docker ❤︎
